text: The Bhikha Bapa (born as Bhikhabhai Bhadrakha) was a Koli saint and devotee of Hindu god Krishna. Bhikha Bapa was childhood friend of Dhirubhai Ambani who was founder of Reliance industries. Bhikha Bapa is now family deity of Ghedia Kolis of Junagadh district. == Tributes == *In 2008, Kolis of Kukasvada village collected the 25 lakh rupees from Koli community and built the temple of Bhikha Bapa in village. == References == Category:People from Gujarat
title: Bhikha Bapa
